metadata.name: AADInternals PowerShell Cmdlets Execution - PsScript
metadata.comment: Detects ADDInternals Cmdlet execution. A tool for administering Azure AD and Office 365. Which can be abused by threat actors to attack Azure AD or Office 365.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('convertto-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('disable-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('enable-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('export-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('grant-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('install-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('join-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('open-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('read-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('register-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('restore-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('search-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('send-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('start-aadint')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('update-aadint'))))

output.summary: Detects ADDInternals Cmdlet execution. A tool for administering Azure AD and Office 365. Which can be abused by threat actors to attack Azure AD or Office 365.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of the library for administrative activity References: https://o365blog.com/aadinternals/, https://github.com/Gerenios/AADInternals
